## How to Test
1. Steps to run locally (commands, env vars, sample requests)
2. Expected results (status codes, outputs)
3. Any edge cases verified

## Checklist
- [ ] Scope is small and focused (atomic)
- [ ] Commit messages follow convention
- [ ] Docs updated (README / progress / others)
- [ ] Tests pass locally (N/A if docs-only)
- [ ] CI passes (when enabled)
- [ ] No secrets or credentials included

## Risks & Rollback
- Risk level: Low / Medium / High
- Blast radius: list touched areas/files
- Rollback: revert this PR
